subcommands.raw_help_text:

Usage: bin/kibana serve [options]

Run the kibana server

Options:
  -e, --elasticsearch <uri1,uri2>  Elasticsearch instances
  -c, --config <path>              Path to the config file, use multiple
                                   --config args to include multiple config
                                   files (default: [])
  -p, --port <port>                The port to bind to
  -Q, --silent                     Set the root logger level to off
  --verbose                        Set the root logger level to all
  -H, --host <host>                The host to bind to
  -l, --log-file <path>            Deprecated, set logging file destination in
                                   your configuration
  --plugin-path <path>             A path to a plugin which should be included
                                   by the server, this can be specified
                                   multiple times to specify multiple paths
                                   (default: [])
  --allow-root                     Required if Kibana is ran as root
  --optimize                       Deprecated, running the optimizer is no
                                   longer required
  -h, --help                       output usage information

name: kibana
raw_help_text:
{"log.level":"info","@timestamp":"2025-12-07T21:50:06.418Z","log.logger":"elastic-apm-node","ecs.version":"8.10.0","agentVersion":"4.13.0","env":{"pid":1,"proctitle":"/usr/share/kibana/bin/../node/glibc-217/bin/node","os":"linux 6.14.0-36-generic","arch":"x64","host":"3cf6987d86cd","timezone":"UTC+00","runtime":"Node.js v22.17.1"},"config":{"active":{"source":"start","value":true},"breakdownMetrics":{"source":"start","value":false},"captureBody":{"source":"start","value":"off","commonName":"capture_body"},"captureHeaders":{"source":"start","value":false},"centralConfig":{"source":"start","value":false},"contextPropagationOnly":{"source":"start","value":true},"environment":{"source":"start","value":"production"},"globalLabels":{"source":"start","value":[["git_rev","c0340ed35c591c77a90ebf1c790c20aa07571672"]],"sourceValue":{"git_rev":"c0340ed35c591c77a90ebf1c790c20aa07571672"}},"logLevel":{"source":"default","value":"info","commonName":"log_level"},"metricsInterval":{"source":"start","value":120,"sourceValue":"120s"},"serverUrl":{"source":"start","value":"https://kibana-cloud-apm.apm.us-east-1.aws.found.io/","commonName":"server_url"},"transactionSampleRate":{"source":"start","value":0.1,"commonName":"transaction_sample_rate"},"captureSpanStackTraces":{"source":"start","sourceValue":false},"secretToken":{"source":"start","value":"[REDACTED]","commonName":"secret_token"},"serviceName":{"source":"start","value":"kibana","commonName":"service_name"},"serviceVersion":{"source":"start","value":"9.2.2","commonName":"service_version"}},"activationMethod":"require","message":"Elastic APM Node.js Agent v4.13.0"}

  Usage: bin/kibana [command=serve] [options]
  
  Kibana is an open source, browser based analytics and search dashboard for Elasticsearch.
  
  Commands:
    serve  [options]  Run the kibana server
    help  <command>   Get the help for a specific command
  
  "serve" Options:
  
    -e, --elasticsearch <uri1,uri2>  Elasticsearch instances
    -c, --config <path>              Path to the config file, use multiple
                                     --config args to include multiple config
                                     files (default: [])
    -p, --port <port>                The port to bind to
    -Q, --silent                     Set the root logger level to off
    --verbose                        Set the root logger level to all
    -H, --host <host>                The host to bind to
    -l, --log-file <path>            Deprecated, set logging file destination in
                                     your configuration
    --plugin-path <path>             A path to a plugin which should be included
                                     by the server, this can be specified
                                     multiple times to specify multiple paths
                                     (default: [])
    --allow-root                     Required if Kibana is ran as root
    --optimize                       Deprecated, running the optimizer is no
                                     longer required
    -h, --help                       output usage information
